U.S. lawmakers arrive in Taiwan in post-election show of supportThe leaders of the U.S. House of Representatives Taiwan Caucus, Republican Representative Mario Diaz Balart and Democratic Representative Ami Bera, have arrived in Taipei, their offices said on Tuesday, in a show of support after the island's election. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:57:43 GMT QXWT2MLXDFJOLC6ETTIBW5LL7I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-lawmakers-arrive-taiwan-post-election-show-support-2024-01-23/Patricia Zengerle世界亚太地区
Morning Bid: Testing China, Hong Kong stocks' bounce back abilityA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 22:03:58 GMT HAEBMNIUWBIBTILZTFFIBX2P4E https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-2024-01-23/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
Magnitude 5.67 aftershock strikes Kyrgyzstan-Xinjiang borderAn earthquake of magnitude 5.67 struck the Kyrgyzstan-Xinjiang border region on Wednesday, just a day after a magnitude 7.1 quake in the same area, the German Research Center for Geosciences (GFZ) said. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 21:23:04 GMT GSKJ4WSHZBM6ZKN7GEYMZVYZUU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/magnitude-567-aftershock-strikes-kyrgyzstan-xinjiang-border-2024-01-23/Reuters世界亚太地区
Al-Nassr postpone China friendlies as Ronaldo injured before Inter Miami clashCristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr have cancelled their two-game China tour after the forward suffered an injury, the Saudi club said on Tuesday, sparking concern over the Portuguese's participation in their upcoming encounter against Lionel Messi's Inter Miami. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 17:26:41 GMT WEWCP7GGSJMCHBN7V2OZNVFMBE https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/al-nassr-postpone-china-friendlies-ronaldo-injured-before-inter-miami-clash-2024-01-23/Reuters运动的足球
US-listed China stocks bounce off lows on hopes of Beijing supportNew York-listed shares of Chinese companies bounced back on Tuesday after a dour start to the year, after a report of a rescue package for the slumping domestic stock market buoyed sentiment. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 16:07:16 GMT M667DOIAWRL2DDLWMS2AL2DXM4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/us-listed-china-stocks-bounce-off-lows-hopes-beijing-support-2024-01-23/Medha Singh市场美国市场
Jack Ma bought Alibaba shares worth $50 mln in fourth quarter - NYTAlibaba co-founder Jack Ma and Chairman Joe Tsai bought millions worth of shares in the Chinese e-commerce giant in the fourth quarter, the New York Times reported on Tuesday, sending the company's U.S.-listed shares up around 7%. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 15:23:22 GMT A5PCJLFYUFIQTC3Z6HADH4LCUE https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/jack-ma-bought-alibaba-shares-worth-50-mln-fourth-quarter-nyt-2024-01-23/Reuters商业零售与消费品
